data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Kolkata, West Bengal, India humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Kolkata, West Bengal, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the county of Kolkata access to a Bible in their own language.
God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 49,464 believers in Kolkata, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Kolkata, West Bengal, India will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Bedia (Muslim traditions) people might believe through him.
Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 4,496,700 people living in Kolkata, West Bengal, India. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Kolkata.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Kolkata, West Bengal, India to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.
